title: 4K - Beast from Haunted Cave (1959 Thriller) Greed digs graves... and awakens monsters

sources.title: 4K - Beast from Haunted Cave (1959 Thriller) Greed digs graves... and awakens monsters
sources.description:
A giant spider stalks a band of thieves in this schlocky thriller from Gene Corman Productions. The story follows gangster Alexander Ward and his crew as they enlist the help of a local ski-instructor in the heist of several gold bars. But when they use explosives to create a distraction, they disturb the lair of a massive spider! Monte Hellman, the man behind such cult favorites as Two-Lane Blacktop, made his directorial debut with Beast From Haunted Cave. Trivia note: This movie debuted on a double bill with The Wasp Woman.

+ audio commentary

Original title: Beast from Haunted Cave

Directed by: Monte Hellman
Written by: Charles B. Griffith

Colorized version https://youtu.be/wBUek9KT-Rg

Main cast:
Michael Forest — Gil Jackson
Sheila Noonan — Gypsy Boulet
Frank Wolff — Alexander Ward
Richard Sinatra — Marty Jones
Wally Campo — Byron Smith
Linné Ahlstrand — Natalie
Chris Robinson — The Beast
Kay Jennings — Small Dove

Genres: Horror, Crime/Heist, Thriller
Release date: July 5, 1959
Filming location: South Dakota, USA

Keywords: cult film, cult monster, heist gone wrong
